name: Finding The Slime
description:
This is the game I made for the game jam "What-A-Jam!". I am a little confused about the "shortcut" theme that I will implement into this game and finally I decided to include this guy in this game.

This is a teleport stone that can take players to different levels at random, and it (probably) a shortcut to finding the King Slime to beat in this game.  However, I highly recommend attacking the King Slime well prepared.

Control:

Arrow key to move and jump.

"A" key to attack

I also made an Android version so that mobile users can enjoy this game.

Resource:

all the assets that I use in this game are private property, except for the fonts that I took from here.

if you are interested in the assets that I use, this is an asset that I use in this game, please check it.

***

I am very open to feedback, and if the community gives me room to grow, I will continue to develop this project.
